algorithm_technique: Iterate through the string, counting consecutive identical characters and summing contributions.
problem_summary_simple: Count all substrings where all characters are the same, modulo 10^9 + 7.
problem_summary_technical: A single pass counts consecutive identical characters, summing the arithmetic series of substrings for each group.
key_insights: A contiguous block of 'c' characters of length 'k' contributes k*(k+1)/2 homogenous substrings.
The problem can be solved by iterating and keeping track of the current consecutive count.
Modulo arithmetic is crucial to prevent overflow.
